com.smartwalkie.voicepingsdk

Class VoicePing.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartwalkie.voicepingsdk.VoicePing.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    VoicePing

    public static final class VoicePing.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to instantiate VoicePing with custom parameters
